content: this chenille plush no-sew pocket polar bear crochet pattern is the perfect amigurumi project for bear lovers pocket polar bear crochet along video right hand https //youtu be/hofsvm4nt8y left hand https //youtu be/p8glt6ydwi8 beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques -magic_ring -single_crochet -increasing 2 stitches into one stitch -decreasing join 2 stitches into 1 -double_crochet -half_double_crochet -small bobble -bobble -fastening off this no-sew no-magic_ring pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions pictures and a video tutorial to help you along the way pocket polar bear is crocheted in the round/continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round pocket polar bear is crocheted in super bulky chenille yarn and is approximately 3 inches tall including top of ear be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun supplies needed to make pocket polar bear -super bulky 6 weight yarn i used premier parfait chunky chenille yarn -worsted weight yarn bow -h 5mm crochet hook -e 3 5mm crochet hook bow -two 14mm plastic safety eyes not recommended for children under 3 years old -18mm safety nose -polyfil or stuffing of your choice -yarn needle -scissors -locking stitch markers optional do not distribute sell alter or share this pattern please feel free to sell the items you make from this shop
